jules_hotfix.title: Hotfix_AI_Engine_NameError
jules_hotfix.instruction: Fix the NameError in `simulation/decisions/ai_driven_household_engine.py` around L331. The variable 'markets' is no longer defined locally. Replace legacy 'markets' references in the Real Estate logic with 'context.market_snapshot' or 'context.markets' as appropriate. Ensure IBankService formalization (from Track Bravo) is respected.
